long_description: a special place for you & your four-legged friend serving huntersville, nc & cornelius, nc. compassionate care awaits you at hambright animal hospital. at hambright animal hospital, we're trying to change that, one visit at a time. that's what sets us apart from other clinics in the huntersville, nc and cornelius, nc area. also serving cornelius, nc and surrounding areas. we provide a wide range of professional services to meet your needs. it takes a team of skilled veterinary professionals and loving pet parents working together toward a common goal. at hambright animal hospital , this is exactly what you'll get.

generated_description: hambright animal hospital is a veterinary clinic located in huntersville and cornelius, north carolina that offers a range of services to keep pets healthy and happy. their team of skilled veterinary professionals and pet parents work together to provide exceptional medicine and modern treatment options. they offer a comprehensive list of services, including diagnostics, laboratory, digital radiology, ultrasound, general, oral, orthopedic, and ophthalmic surgery, and advanced dentistry with dr. gleason. the clinic also provides acupuncture in traditional chinese veterinary medicine, which has been used for thousands of years to treat a variety of conditions and can be used to treat pets as well. hambright animal hospitals prides itself on providing a warm and inviting environment for pets and their owners.
